title: Draft Pick Role/Lane Swapping
body:
Hi guys, was wondering today while playing draft pick, I had two team mates who swapped roles.
An Idea formed in my head, how all the lanes have the pegs/flags in the pick screen. Would it not be possible to implement the ability to click on the flag to bring up a trade for that lane/role as it will be alot clearer for your team mates if you do swap roles. And in the instance someone is chat banned they would still be able to change lanes without having to talk in chat.
Just an idea
